Package org.iotivity.service.server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RcsResourceObject.GetRequestHandler
    Interface definition for a handler to be invoked when a get request is received.
    RcsResourceObject.OnAttributeUpdatedListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an attribute is updated.
    RcsResourceObject.SetRequestHandler
    Interface definition for a handler to be invoked when a set request is received.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RcsGetResponse
    This class provides methods to create the response for a get request.
    RcsLockedAttributes  
    RcsRequest
    This class describes the request.
    RcsResourceObject
    RCSResourceObject represents a resource.
    RcsResourceObject.AttributesLock
    This provides the way to get the attributes of RcsResourceObject with lock.
    RcsResourceObject.Builder
    This is a builder to create resource with properties and attributes.
    RcsSetResponse
    This class provides methods to create the response for a received set request.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RcsResourceObject.AutoNotifyPolicy
    Represents the policy of AutoNotify function of RCSResourceObject class In accord with this, observers are notified of attributes that are changed or updated.
    RcsResourceObject.SetRequestHandlerPolicy
    Represents the policy of set-request handler.
    RcsSetResponse.AcceptanceMethod
    Options for handling a set request.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RcsUnlockedException
    Thrown when trying to access a unlocked RcsLockedAttributes.
